wiyatnamaya, 2012 okthombar masayawana wita wiyatnama jathika aarthikayata dawantha dayakathawayak labademin jangama durakathana apanayana ihalamakarmika nishpadana apanayana agaya wartha kirimata samath wiya.pradhana ayojakaya koriyanu samusansamagama.2009 di wiyatnamaya thulanishpadana katayuthu aarambha kara wasarakata jangama durakathana yanthra miliyana 100 bagin jagath welandapolata nikuth karamin, me dakwa wiyatnamawelandapola thula pramukha apanayana nishpadakaya wu japana kanon samagama eka rayakin ikmawa yamata hakiwiya.
ehi theruma wanne minis jiwithaye awurudu hatharen pasuwa kiriwala thibena pradhana poshana sanghataka thunen dekakma minis sirura wisin prathikshepa karana bawayi.

da silwa mahathage pradhanathwayeni.mulin rajya sansthawak lesa aarambha wi thibena me kamhala 1978 n pasu sima sahitha samagamak bawata pathwa thibe.samastha rabar karmanthaye diyunuwa ha rabar kshethraye siyalu katayuthu sandaha puhunu aayathanayak lesa kriya kirima mehi mulika aramuna weyi.siya gananak sewaka sewikawan piriwara gath rate wadagath rajya aayathanayak lesa ekala kriya kalada warthamanayedi me kamhala sewaka sewikawan 34denakuta sima wemin naya barin mirikunu aayathanayak bawata pathwa thibe.rajya sampath ha wyawasaya sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam aacharya wili gamage mahatha amathi pi.
